availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Barnes (Harrison County, Kentucky, cooper and farmer )

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, cooper and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary "Polly" Godman Barnes in Harrison County, Kentucky, in September 1816. Father of Milton Barnes, Susan Barnes, Eliza Barnes, Elizabeth Barnes, Emily Barnes, and John C. Barnes. Cooper in Harrison County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 97A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 669.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Mortality Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Berrys Precinct, p. 567.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film #000216880.
